mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_BIRTH = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{memberBirth}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYYY/MM/DD'), MEMBER_PHONE = SUBSTR(#{memberPhone},0,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(#{memberPhone},4, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(#{memberPhone},8, 4), MEMBER_PIC = #{memberPic} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATE = 3 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATE = 2 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.PRO_NO , A.PRO_NAME , B.MEMBER_ID FROM PROJECT A LEFT JOIN PROJECT_JOIN_STATE B ON A.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND B.PRO_JOINSTATE = 1 GROUP BY A.PRO_NO, A.PRO_NAME, B.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY A.PRO_NO DESC
